label: Fetch Web Content
description: Retrieve raw HTML or rendered text from a webpage for downstream processing.

label: Web Search
description: Run contextual search queries across the public web and return ranked results.

label: Generate DOCX
description: Assemble a Microsoft Word document (DOCX) from structured content or templates.

label: Deep Research
description: Perform multi-step research with citations, combining browsing, summarization, and synthesis.
